blogPost.excerpt: ZujoNow Webinar provides SDK for in house scalable webinar development. It broadens your reach with a capacity of more than 1k participants.
blogPost.body: ZujoNow Webinar provides SDK for in house scalable webinar development. It broadens your reach with a capacity of more than 1k participants.
blogPost.title: Zujo Now Webinar - Build scalable and engaging video experiences
blogPost.author: Arjun Kava

localize.description: ZujoNow网络研讨会为内部可扩展的网络研讨会开发提供SDK。它扩大了您的覆盖面，可容纳1k以上的参与者。
localize.tagline: 构建可扩展和吸引人的视频体验

localize.description: ZujoNow網絡研討會爲內部可擴展的網絡研討會開發提供SDK。它擴大了您的覆蓋面，可容納1k以上的參與者。
localize.tagline: 構建可擴展和吸引人的視頻體驗

previous.title:
In a letter to President Joe Biden, https://t.co/7MqbvX6EpN on Wednesday offered to use its vast logistical resources to help distribute COVID-19 vaccines in the U.S.
https://t.co/oeYHWevA1W

localize.full_text:
周三，https://t.co/7MqbvX6EpN，在给美国总统乔-拜登的信中，表示愿意利用其庞大的后勤资源，帮助在美国分发COVID-19疫苗。
https://t.co/oeYHWevA1W

週三，https://t.co/7MqbvX6EpN，在給美國總統喬-拜登的信中，表示願意利用其龐大的後勤資源，幫助在美國分發COVID-19疫苗。
https://t.co/oeYHWevA1W
